sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, movie_info_idx mi_idx
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.kind_id  =  7 AND t.production_year  <  2004 AND mc.company_id  <  27 AND mc.company_type_id  >  1
